jobInfo.postDescription:
About the role 
The Desktop Support Engineer will be responsible for providing the 1st line IT support for incidents, problems and requests to internal Abcam customers.
Roles & responsibilities:
Respond to IT tickets 
Install and configure end user laptops 
Perform new starter/leaver processes for the AD account, software license and equipment 
Manage user account (e.g. password reset, unlock) 
Maintain PC hardware and software in the operable state 
Perform asset management activities 
Keep IT inventory record up-to-date 
Handle IT related expenses and invoices 
Write knowledgebase articles as required 
Office/desk reconfiguration as required 
Infrastructure support as required
Report to APAC IT Manager on the weekly basis of the ongoing issues in English 
About you
1-3 years of prior desktop support experience 
Hands-on experience with Windows environment and TCP/IP networking 
Good knowledge of Office365 suite apps  
Strong technical troubleshooting skills 
Excellent communication skills in both verbal and written Chinese 
Good team player and interpersonal skills 
Ability to multi-task 
Customer-focused attitude
If this sounds like you and you’d like to be a part of a fast paced, growing business with the vision to become the most influential company and best-loved brand in life sciences please apply now!
About Us
As an innovator in reagents and tools, we provide the research and clinical communities with tools and scientific support. We offer highly validated biological binders and assays to address important targets in critical biological pathways.
Already a pioneer in data sharing and ecommerce in the life sciences, our ambition is to be the most influential company in life sciences by helping advance global understanding of biology and causes of disease, which, in turn, will drive new treatments and improved health.
While we’ve evolved over the years to become a leading provider of life science research tools, our ethos remains the same as it was in 1998: helping scientists make breakthroughs faster by providing the highest quality reagents.
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区艾博抗(上海)贸易有限公司

brandComInfo.introduce: Abcam是一家英国上市公司，艾博抗（上海）贸易有限公司是Abcam在中国设立的公司，于2014年1月成立。Abcam总公司位于英国剑桥。我们为您提供高品质的蛋白质研究工具和专业的技术支持，所呈现的数据精准可靠且实时更新。
